user_query: I'm building a language learning platform and need to provide translations for various learning materials.

TaskList.description: Research and identify available translation APIs that offer accurate translations for multiple languages.
Evaluate the features and pricing of the identified translation APIs.
Select the most suitable translation API based on evaluation criteria.
Research and identify available language detection APIs that can identify the language of the learning materials.
Evaluate the features and pricing of the identified language detection APIs.
Select the most suitable language detection API based on evaluation criteria.
